episode_event_specialcos01_ch0113_40_mik:
A few days before the day of the Battle of the
Golden Spheres...

Um... I was thinking of practicing some moves
with Steelix for a bit, and I was wondering...
Whoa! Ah, you seem excited...but how do I—
Hey! Whatcha doin’?
Oh! Hi there, Hilda!

I was thinking of doing some extra training with
my Pokémon.

But apparently, Celesteela is what they call an
Ultra Beast? So I’m not quite sure what to do...

I see... So you’re not sure how you should battle
together, huh.
Hold on a sec. I’ve got an idea!
H-Hilda? Where are you going?

If you wanna learn more about Ultra Beasts,
maybe we can get some advice from Lusamine!

It’s a pleasure to meet you, Jasmine. If there’s
anything I can do, I’d be more than happy
to help!

I hope you don’t mind that I tagged along. I’m
always curious to hear more about rare Pokémon!
O-of course! I’d love to have your input, too!

Oh...that pink shine really is something. No
wonder they say it’s the loveliest sight in the
whole world.

Er...actually, the Pokémon we’d like to talk about
is that one over there!

Oh, sorry! I was completely captivated by
your Diancie!

Tell me, do you think that your Celesteela is
different from other Pokémon?
Um... Well...

It is true that Ultra Beasts have tremendous power,
which can be dangerous. But really, that can be
said for most other Pokémon, too.
There’s no need to be scared.

It’s good to adapt to what’s best for your partner
Pokémon, but you shouldn’t take it too far.

You don’t have to focus solely on training
Celesteela to get better at its strengths.

It’s also important to teach Celesteela the style of
battle that you’re good at, too.
So really, the answer is quite simple.

It doesn’t really matter if that Pokémon is an Ultra
Beast or not...because it’s your precious
partner Pokémon!
You know what? You’re so right!

Celesteela is Celesteela. I should be up-front and
direct about what I’d like to do, too!
It looks like you’ve figured it out!
Yes! Thank you for the advice, everyone!

No prob! Actually...how about we test that
out in battle right now?
Sure! Let’s do it!
Yay! We did it, Celesteela!
Aw, we lost!
Oof... I may have created a beast!

*chuckle* Looks like your advice might’ve made
your rival even stronger!
Yeah, seems so! But I’m still grateful for your help!

Battles are more fun when your opponent is
strong and worry-free anyway!
Haha! Yeah, I think so, too!

I hope you and Celesteela can continue to foster
your friendship together.

Next time we see each other, I’d love to see just
how strong your bond has become!
Yes! Thank you so much for all the advice!
Oh, and Celesteela! Thanks for battling with me!

It looks like you’ve got a few scuffs... How about I
give you a good polishing?

After that, we can all get back to training for
the event!
